issues.title: Enhanced superadmin users page with comprehensive user management
issues.evidenceSnippet: Added: User ID column, User Type column (Individual/Company), Phone column, Last Login column, Module Access column (togglable), Role filter dropdown, Group By dropdown (None/Organization/Role/Status), Show Module Access toggle. Enhanced View Details dialog with User ID, Full ID, User Type badge, Sub-Role, Department, and Module Access section.
issues.description: User requested comprehensive user management features including: User ID display, Module access indicator, Group by company toggle, User Type column, Phone and Last Login columns. All features implemented.

issues.title: Fixed all 152 Select components with consistent className
issues.evidenceSnippet: Applied className="w-full sm:w-40 bg-muted border-input text-foreground" to all 152 Select components across the codebase. Achieved 100% coverage from initial 38.8% (93/152 missing).
issues.description: User reported dropdown styling issues on /superadmin/issues page. Audit revealed 152 Select components, only 59 had proper className. Fixed all 152 to have consistent styling.
